#summary This page guides you on configuring Language Bar to easily switch between languages with keyboard shortcuts.
#labels Phase-Deploy
<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

= Windows XP =

Start > Control Panel > Regional and Language Options

Go to *Languages tab*

Click *Details*

Click *Key Settings*

In this screenshot 

 * Ctrl+Shift+1 is set to English
 * Ctrl+Shift+4 is set to Sinhala

[http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/2122/advancedkeysettings2008mg3.png]

Personalize your Key Sequence accordingly 

Press OK

Finalized Language Bar entries:

[http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/8796/ss20081129214049av7.png]



= Windows Vista / Windows 7 =

Start > Control Panel > Regional and Language Settings 

Change Keyboards

Go to Advanced Key Settings

In this screenshot 

 * Ctrl+1 is set to English
 * Ctrl+2 is set to Sinhala

[http://img377.imageshack.us/img377/8223/textservicesandinputlanrf2.png]

Change the Key Sequence

[http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/9176/changekeysequence200811qt2.png]

Press OK

Finalized Language Bar entries:

[http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/2781/ss20081113214852ce3.png]
